articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: HAL shares gain on shareholders' nod for stock split in 60th AGM - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Shareholders of HAL approved sub division of equity shares of the defence company in its 60th Annual General Meeting held on August 31, 2023. HAL has fixed Friday, September 29 as the Record Date for stock split.
articles.content: Shares of Hindustan Aeronautics (HAL) rose about one percent on September 4, as shareholders of the defence player approved sub division of equity shares of the company in its 60th Annual General Mee… [+1612 chars]
